snippet: With her tenure as Secretary of State coming to an end, Hillary Rodham Clinton appears to be a figure of nearly limitless possibility, but her next few years could ultimately be defined by her plans for the 2016 election.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton's next few years could ultimately be defined by her plans for 2016 election, now that her tenure as Secretary of State is coming to end; Clinton will be under heavy scrutiny until she decides whether she will run for president again.

byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro and Amy Chozick contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: With her tenure as Secretary of State coming to an end, Hillary Rodham Clinton appears to be a figure of nearly limitless possibility, but her next few years could ultimately be defined by her plans for the 2016 election.

headline.seo: Hillary Clinton’s Countless Choices Could Hinge on 2016 Election
headline.main: Clinton’s Countless Choices Hinge on One: 2016
headline.print_headline: Clinton’s Countless Choices Hinge on One: 2016
